name: _Luca_Home_Cappuccino_Italian_Leather_Loveseat
description: Contemporary design and plenty of style makes this Capuccino tufted leather loveseat a perfect fit for your modern decor sure to complement any living room. All of the pieces of the set are made of high quality products making it as durable as it is stylish. Upholstery is using the finest Italian leather combined with the best designed leather match material available for areas of minimal use. StyleContemporaryMaterialLeather, Synthetic LeatherTypeLoveseatAssemblyAssembledColorBeige, Brown, CreamFurniture PatternSolid
